div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 07:15 am CDT

div.div: Scattered showers, mainly after 5pm. Areas of fog before 9am. Otherwise, cloudy, with a high near 61. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

Showers, mainly before 1am, then periods of rain after 1am. Low around 46. East northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New precipitation amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

Periods of rain. High near 54. Breezy, with a northeast wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New precipitation amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

font.marquee: ..... School Offices are open Monday, Wednesday & Friday each week from 8-11:30 a.m..........The Board Meeting scheduled for Monday March 30, 2020 has been cancelled......Remote Learning Days start Tuesday March 31, 2020.......... Please see the article on the front page School Closure Food Service Procedures which explains how to order a "grab and go" breakfast and lunch for your students. This is available for ALL Tri-Point students.....Tripoint Schools will be closed Tuesday March 17 through April 30.......... E-Learning assignments are posted on each schools elearning tab here on the website...........

div.p:
Dear Parents and Community Members:
I hope this message finds you and your families safe and well. Today, Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker announced that remote learning in Illinois will be extended through the end of the 2019-20 school year. Although in-person learning has been suspended for the remainder of the year, I assure you our entire staff remains committed to learning and engaging with all students through . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about End of Year Pritzker Announcement

div.p:
Next week, Thursday, April 9 was a scheduled vacation day. We will change that to a student attendance day, meaning that we have assignments for students that day.
Next week, April 10 was a scheduled vacation day. We will change that to a remote learning planning day - no new student assignments. Teachers will use this day as a catch-up type of day/planning day.

a.aria-label: Read more about School Calendar Change

h3.a: Extension of Stay at Home Order

div.p:
Dear Parents and Community Members:
I hope this message finds you and your families safe and well. Today, Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker announced that remote learning in Illinois will be extended through April 30 in order to slow down the spread of COVID-19.
During this time, on-site learning will remain suspended but our schools’ commitment to learning and education will remain open . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Extension of Stay at Home Order

div.p:
On Friday, March 27 th , The State Superintendent of Schools announced that schools across the state will be transitioning from “Act of God” days to Remote Learning Days.
As you may remember, we enacted Remote Learning Days, or as we called them, E-Learning Days, during the last school year when we experienced a polar vortex and temperatures stayed below zero for a number of days and once again this year when we . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Transition to Remote Learning Days

div.p:
Tri-Point CUSD #6J
Covid-19 School Closure Food Service Procedures
Dear Parents and Guardians,
Thank you for your extraordinary support over the past several days, as we have worked together to protect our community during the growing coronavirus/COVID-19 pandemic. To further safeguard Illinois from the spread of the virus, Governor JB Pritzker has declared mandatory school closures for . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about School Closure Food Service Procedures

div.p: State law requires that pupil records cannot be released without the written consent of the adult student. For security purposes, a representative from Tri-Point High School may contact you to verify your identity. Mail, fax, scan and email ( emersond@tripointschools.org ) , or hand-deliver your completed form to TPHS. Please fill out an individual Transcript Release Form for each and every request. Incomplete forms will not . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Requesting Tri-Point Transcript
